an4.168:1.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
an4.168:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahamoggallano ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an4.168:2.8: Imasam, avuso, catunnam patipadanam katamam te patipadam agamma anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuttan”ti?
an4.168:3.3: Dukkha patipada dandhabhinna, dukkha patipada khippabhinna, sukha patipada dandhabhinna, sukha patipada khippabhinna.
an4.168:3.5: Imasam, avuso, catunnam patipadanam yayam patipada sukha khippabhinna, imam me patipadam agamma anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuttan”ti.
